data.actual_result: There's no way to unserver mute/deafen yourself on mobile
data.expected_result: You should be able to access your UserSettings or a tab where you can unserver mute/deafen yourself
data.short_description: Users cannot unserver mute/deafen in the mobile app [Missing Feature]
data.steps_to_repro: - For example, let's simulate a case. Let's say you and MR.1 are admins in a server. Both of you join a voice channel with some people to talk about cats. And, then MR.1 wants to make a joke and server mute yourself. - In the mobile app you are not able to unmute or undeafen yourself. You need someone else to do it. Someone have to unmute yourself exactly how you was muted. - It is really weird, if you are the owner and your staff want to make jokes like this, and you cannot unmute yourself
